Translations.Text: tirasara siduvima vanahi
ema tirasara siduvima yanu kumak da
tirasara siduvima yanu kumakdæyi numbata dænum dunne kumak da
(hadavat) tigæssimata pat karavana dinaya pilibanda samud janaya ha ad janaya boru kaloya
samud janaya vu kali ovuhu maha handakin vinasa karanu læbuha
tavada ad janaya vu kali ovun dædi handakin yut suli sulangakin vinasa karanu læbiya
eya ovun veta ratri hatak ha dahaval atak akhanda va ohu eviya. evita ovun bol vu indi gas vala kandan men ehi vinasayata pat va sitinu numba dakinnata tibuni
evita ovungen itiri va sitina kisivaku ho numba dutuveda
firavun ha ohuta pera vuvan da uduyatikuru perala damanu læbuvan da væradi karamin pæminiyoya
ovuhu ovunge paramadhipatige dutayananta pitupæha. eheyin bihisunu grahanayakin ohu ovun hasu kaleya
jalaya ikmava giya kalhi niyata vasayenma api numbala va yatrave isiluvemu
eya api numbalata menehi kirimak bavata pat karanu pinisa ha dharanaya karana savan eya dharanaya karanu pinisaya
horanævehi ek pimbumak pimbinu læbu vita
tavada mahapolova ha kandu osavanu læba e deka eka paharin helanu labana vita
edina sidu vana dæ sidu vanu æta
tavada ahasa pæli yanu æta. evita eya edina durvala va pavati
tavada e avata pætivala malakvarun veti. edina ovunata ihalin (prabala malakvarun) ata deneku numbe paramadhipatige ars (hevat rajadhaniya) osava gena sititi
edina numbala idiripat karanu labannehuya. sangavana kisivak numbala aturin sængavenne næta
tama vartava tama dakunatata denu læbu aya vu kali “o menna! mage vartava numbala kiyava balanu
niyata vasayenma mage viniscayata mama muhuna dena bava sæbævinma mama situvemi” yæyi pavasayi
evita ohu trptimat jivitayehi sitiyi
usas (svarga) uyanehi veyi
ehi valubarin yut palaturu samipayen pavatiyi
“pasu giya dina vala ( lovedi) numbala gata kala (honda dæ) hetuven numbala satutin anubhava karanu. tavada panaya karanu” (yæyi pavasanu læbe)
tavada tama varta pota tama vamatata denu læbu aya vu kali, “aho ! mage vinasaya ! mage vartava mata denu nolæbuve nam !” yæyi pavasayi
“tavada mage viniscaya kumakdæyi ma nodani nam !” (kotaram aganeda)
“aho khedaya! eya(maranaya) avasan tinduva vuye nam” (kotaram aganeda?) yæyi pavasayi
“mage dhanaya mata kisidu phalak nodunneya.”
“mage balaya magen paha va gos æta.” (yæyi tavaduratat pavasayi)
“numbala ohu va grahanaya karanu. tavada ohuta vilamgu damanu.”
pasu va ohu va nirayata æda dama pulussanu
ohu riyan hættævak digu damvælak tula veyi. numbala ohu va ehi bænda damanu
niyata vasayenma ohu sarva baladhari allah visvasa nokaranneku viya
tavada dilindunta ahara sæpayimata diri gænvuye da næta
eheyin ada dina ohuta mehi kisidu samipa mitureku næta
mage (tuvalavala) særava misa venat kisidu aharayak da næta
væradi kalavun misa eya kisivaku anubhava nokarayi
numbala dakina dæ mata da mama divurami
numbala nodakina dæ mata da mama divurami
niyata vasayenma meya gauravaniya dutayakuge prakasayaki
tavada eya kaviyakuge prakasayak da noveyi. numbala visvasa karanuye svalpayaki
eya huniyamkaruvakuge prakasayak da noveyi. numbala menehi karanne svalpayaki
(eya) sakala lokayange paramadhipatigen pahala karanu læbuvaki
prabandhayan samaharak apa veta ohu gota pævasuve nam
api ohu va dakunatin hasukara gannemu
pasu va prana nalaya ohugen api kapa harinnemu
evita numbala aturin kisiveku ho (apagen) ohuva valakvannan lesa nositiyi
tavada niyata vasayenma eya biya bætimatunhata menehi kirimaki
niyata vasayenma numbala aturin musavadin sitina bava sæbævinma api danimu
tavada niyata vasayenma eya deva pratiksepakayinhata balavat sokayaki
tavada niyata vasayenma eya sthira satyayaki
eheyin numbage sarva baladhari paramadhipatige namayen suvisuddha karanu
